speak;Morrissey;Simon, you seem tired.
speak;Morrissey;Were the chambers not to your liking?
speak;Simon;No, the rooms were more than fine.
speak;Simon;I just had some trouble sleeping.
speak;Morrissey;Ah, I understand.
wait;500
speak;Morrissey;Please, you simply must take your mind off of this.
speak;Morrissey;Why don't you join my daughter Anuki in a skirmish against my guard captain?
speak;Morrissey;It would be nice to see how you and your companions fight.
wait;700
speak;Morrissey;And perhaps, if I may be forward with you...
speak;Morrissey;This will spark something between Anuki and yourself as well.
speak;Morrissey;A union between our houses would be most advantageous.
speak;Morrissey;Especially given the state of yours, if you will excuse my frankness.
speak;Simon;Wait, what?
speak;Morrissey;I only ask that you think on it.
wait;500
speak;Morrissey;The training grounds are on the west side of the main hall.
